joke: Why don’t skeletons fight each other? They don’t have the guts!
What do you get when you cross a vampire with a snowman? Frostbite!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
What’s a ghost’s favorite dessert? Boo-berry pie!
Why do ghosts go on diets? So they can keep their ghoulish figures!
How do you fix a broken pumpkin? With a pumpkin patch!
Why don’t mummies take vacations? They’re afraid they’ll relax and unwind!
What’s a witch’s favorite subject in school? Spelling!
Why are skeletons so calm? Because nothing gets under their skin!
What’s it like to be kissed by a vampire? It’s a pain in the neck!
What do you call a fat pumpkin? A plumpkin!
How do vampires start letters? Tomb it may concern…
Why did the zombie skip school? He felt rotten!
What kind of music do mummies listen to? Wrap music!
Why was the witch’s broom late? It swept in!
Why are ghosts bad at lying? Because you can see right through them!
What’s a vampire’s favorite fruit? A blood orange!
What does a skeleton order at a restaurant? Spare ribs!
What do ghosts wear when it’s raining? Boo-ts!
Why don’t vampires have reflections? Because they are total suckers!
What’s a mummy’s favorite type of music? Hip-hop!
What’s a skeleton’s least favorite room? The living room!
How do you make a skeleton laugh? Tickle its funny bone!
Why did Dracula become a vegetarian? Because stakes are too high!
What do you call two witches sharing an apartment? Broommates!
How do ghosts like their eggs? Terror-fried!
What’s a ghost’s favorite game? Hide and shriek!
What do you call a witch’s garage? A broom closet!
What’s a vampire’s favorite dog? A bloodhound!
Why did the skeleton stay out in the snow? Because he was chilled to the bone!
What do witches put on to go trick-or-treating? Mas-scare-a!
What’s a ghoul’s favorite candy? Jawbreakers!
How do you write a book about Halloween? With a ghostwriter!
Why did the vampire read the newspaper? He heard it had great circulation!
Why don’t ghosts like rain? It dampens their spirits!
What’s a witch’s favorite food? Goulash!
How does a vampire get around on Halloween? On blood vessels!
Why was the mummy so tense? He was all wound up!
Why don’t mummies have friends? Because they’re too wrapped up in themselves!
What room does a ghost not need? A living room!
How do witches keep their hair in place while flying? With scare-spray!
What do you call a ghost with a broken leg? A hoblin goblin!
Why do vampires like baseball? Because they love to bat!
What did the werewolf eat after having his teeth cleaned? The dentist!
What’s a monster’s favorite bean? A human bean!
Why was the skeleton afraid to cross the road? He didn’t have the guts!
How does a skeleton call his friends? On the tele-bone!
What did the ghost say when it got hurt? I got a boo-boo!
Why did the vampire get a job at the blood bank? Because he knew the drill!
What kind of horse does a ghost ride? A night-mare!
